description: It has a lot of issues on Ubuntu, the main one being that it crashes my machine too often. Discarding it just because of this issue. Will not buy the subscription if this issue persists.

Ive used Gravit since the beginning. Its just a great alternative for Illustrator or Affinity Designer (both I have experience with). For normal things like creating a banner, mockups, logo design works great! Its not free though its really price accesible and the only good vectorial editor in Linux!
summary: The best vectorial tool for linux

description: gravit is unfortunately not free anymore as a standalone tool. The free version only runs online and and with additional limitations. Also not available as permanent license.

Creators took strange path of marketing by supplying a free software and when users got used to it, cut the main features and made them paid instead of leaving software like it is and adding additional premium features for users to pay for... Would not recommend, you can't predict what path creators will take next time...
summary: Was a great app, not any more..

description:
In short, it is a great application allowing for the creation of Illustrations, advertisements amongst a large list of other graphic output needs. The range of output formats are pretty extensive being both suited for screen and print and it is smooth and pretty fast. Where it falls down (only a bit) is that it can lag a tiny bit when resizing windows and the dialogue boxes are not consistent in asthetics. Being picky, the logo is fuzzy when in the dockbar so a higher quality version would be nice.

A bit of back info and some food for thought for the haters. Having discovered this app about three months before being sold to Corel, I was very impressed by how a group of people were developing and maintaining a design tool that rivalled Sketch and Illustrator and had features that both of these apps did not have out of the box. The support was also great but what did not make sense was where they were getting funding to keep this venture active. It was a full-time venture. When I found out that GravitDesigner had been purchased by Corel, I was a bit concerned as I was not sure what Corel was wanting to do with it. As it is, Corel took it, added a paid version which a very fair pricing model and the people at Gravit I am hoping got paid a good chunk of cash for their development and support of a very needed product. For those that want to get angry or bitter because someone charges for something, try going into a supermarket, walking out without paying for something and then get bitter when you get charged for shoplifting. Work cost money. Resources cost money. If you like something, consider supporting it and that may mean financially.
tbh it's not as good as affinity and this snap package seems to be broken. If it was fixed price like affinity it would make sense or if there was a perpetual fallback license.

I use it mainly for wireframes/mockups which it is a great tool for. It's fast to use and easy to learn. 
Yes, it's not completely free anymore which is completely fair. However, the free version has all I need anyway (I mainly just export as high-res PDF)...
does not start so I will remove it!

A quality tool that's available for linux too!
Its a good alternative for Adobe Illustrator
The App dont open in Snap package and don't have any ".deb" package. Only Image package work. In this caso this App don't have any chance to pay for pro version if this free version doesn't work too.

ubuntu 20.04 lts

It use to have some bugs, but is a great program now and much easier to learn than some other great free vector software.
It is a bit strange how the pricing of this software works. It started of free, but now you'll need to pay for some usefull parts that used to be in the free software.
It run's perfectly on ubuntu 16, 18 and 20. Sometimes there are bugs, but they are always solved in a day or so. I love it and I don't mis AI anymore.

I like this app a lot, it's a good Adobe alternative for Ubuntu/Linux.
The biggest drawback is that I don't stay logged in, it might have something to do with cookies not being saved in the webapp wrapper.
Please fix
summary: Not staying logged in, nice alternative though

description:
They want your email, personal info and money. They also decided to charge $50 a year, when you can just buy Affinity Designer (without having to subscribe to reoccurring payments). Gravit decided to adopt the Adobe model and Serif (the makers of Affinity Designer, Photo and Publisher) are known as the "Adobe Killers" for a reason.

Don't waste your time with Gravit and if you're looking for a open-source solution there are plenty of others (Inkscape, Krita, etc.) who aren't looking to nickel and dime you.

Prossibly ok software, but don't like to have to create an account or link to Google. 
The mention of the creation of an account (even free) should be mandatory on the description
Better than the other Vector drawing software avaliable in Ubuntu, even if you need an account.
but now files can't be saved as file
have been using for a few weeks (free version) and just yesterday it's stop saving file. have lost all my evening work on this. atleast have no payed for this service. terrible!
Most useless software. I say this because somehow saving of files in case you are using a free version is not possible.
I think it includes features found in all the adobe suite in a few megabites...
summary: One of the Best Web Design & Development application..

description: I really enjoy this tool. It has everything that I need.
This software is great but the snapcraft version has a bug that prevents saving. Download the .deb version that works fine.

description:
I having been using gravit for over 4 years now without a pro license and this is the first time after an update I cant export or save files.
PLease Fix it.
A MUST HAVE for Graphic designers on Linux. Great updates and professional grade design software.

description: Although advertised as free, it isn't. This is highly misleading. The "free" version has only very limited functionalities. Further, it requires to register an account with the company and you can only use it while being online.
summary: This app is NOT free and requires an always on sign-up!

description: Need to create an account on a website
summary: Need to create an account on a website

description:
Inkscape kann zwar eine Menge, empfinde ich aber als wenig intuitiv.
Gravit Designer hat für mich als Grafiker eine Lücke unter Linux geschlossen - gut bedienbar, vielseitig nutzbar. Für Web wie auch Print-Projekte.

buenisimaaaaaa esta
Esta aplicacion en su modo libre, tiene muchas funciones para la vectorizacion y el diseño grafico, ademas de otras aplicaciones de la aplicacion
Buena alternativa en linux, comoda y flexible.
Es una aplicación muy buena e intuitiva, todavía le faltan algunas mejoras en cuanto a herramientas, pero por lo general es muy recomendable.
Muy sencilla, fenomenal. Obtiene casi todas las funciones que uno desea como alguien que hace graficos vectoriales y con una interfaz muy amigable al usuario.

description:
Очень долго искал нормальную замену фотошопу, потому что гимп для меня это тьма.
А вот эта приложуха просто рай, все что я делал в фотошопе я могу делать здесь, плюс все интуитивно понятно, аналогично как в фотошопе. В общем, очень круто, рили. Я даже отзыв написал... Всем рекомендую. Могу эту приложуху реальным аналогом фотошопа назвать

Фотошоп? Вы шутите? Gravit-designer это приложение векторного дизайна от компании Corel Inc. С фотошопом близко ничего общего! Программа замечательная. Интерфейс немного подтупливает, все таки сеть для работы необходима.
Это то за, что я с окон убежал. Второй системой стоит линукс. Если уж платный нужен редактор, то переключусь в винду и нормальным фотошопом воспользуюсь.
Чтобы оценить, нужно иметь полную версию, которая стоит как месячная пенсия какой-нибудь старушки

Отличное приложение, но после того как вышло обновление, очень сильно лагает, проекты не сохраняются, стало неудобны и добавили ненужные разделы, вместо действительно полезных функций. Обновление вкрай испоганило мнение, пока 1.
summary: Приложение замечательное, но обновление испортило всё мнение
